meanings.definition: A small hole made in a part of the body for wearing jewelry.
meanings.sent1: She got a new piercing in her earlobe.
meanings.sent2: The piercing in his nose looked stylish.
meanings.sent3: The piercing in her belly button jingled when she laughed.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were drawn to the sparkling piercing on her lip.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight caught the piercing, making it glint brightly.

meanings.sent1: The piercing of the alarm woke everyone up.
meanings.sent2: The piercing of the whistle signaled the end of the game.
meanings.sent3: The piercing of the baby's cry echoed through the house.
meanings.sent4: The piercing of the violin cut through the silence of the room.
meanings.sent5: The piercing of the microphone feedback startled the audience.

meanings.sent1: The piercing wind made her shiver.
meanings.sent2: The piercing cold of the ice made it hard to touch.
meanings.sent3: The piercing chill in the air made him bundle up in layers.
meanings.sent4: The piercing intensity of the movie kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The piercing blue of her eyes seemed to see right through you.
